analyzed: dibbā ca kaññā tidasa carā uḷārā
vaṇṇaḥ ca te sabbadisā pabhāsati iti
tatas ca āgā samaṇaḥ mama antike
id ca iva aham bhante tadā
tatas ca kaṇhaḥ uragaḥ mahā visaḥ
bhikkhu ca tam sāmam muñcitvā anantaka
tat eva kammam kusalam katam mayā
sa devake loke sa mārake ca
aññaḥ muni na atthi tayā anukampako
aññaḥ munī na atthi tayā anukampako
